body_html: We're planning to move away from queues and provide first-class support for multi-epoch processing in the redesigned input pipeline API. Please feel free to comment on #7951 if there are particular features that you'd particularly like to see in the new API!
body_text: We're planning to move away from queues and provide first-class support for multi-epoch processing in the redesigned input pipeline API. Please feel free to comment on #7951 if there are particular features that you'd particularly like to see in the new API!
body: We're planning to move away from queues and provide first-class support for multi-epoch processing in the redesigned input pipeline API. Please feel free to comment on #7951 if there are particular features that you'd particularly like to see in the new API!
